page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {COATES SCHOOL - AUTUMN} MOST OF US PLAY FOOTBALL BUT SOMETIMES WE PLAY TAG OR SKIPPING GAMES. AT 1P.M. WE GO BACK INTO SCHOOL.IN THE AFTERNOON WE HAVE MUSIC,ART,CRAFT AND GAMES. WE GO HOME AT 3.15 P.M.. ON THURSDAY WE GO SWIMMING IN CIRENCESTER WITH RODMARTON SCHOOL. ON FRIDAYS MR.MCGREGOR TAKES US FOR FOOTBALL. IN THE AUTUMN WE HAD OUR PHOTOGRAPHS TAKEN.FOR OUR CONCERT AT CHRISTMAS THE JUNIORS ACTED A PLAY CALLED"THE PEDLAR OF SWAFFHAM".THEN THE JUNIORS READ PASSAGES FROM THE BIBLE AND SANG CAROLS WHILE THE INFANTS ACTED THE NATIVITY. ANOTHER AFTERNOON WE ENTERTAINED THE GOOD COMPANIONS IN THE VILLAGE HALL WITH OUR PLAY AND CAROLS. WE HAD A CHRISTMAS PARTY AND A SPECIAL CHRISTMAS DINNER. .
